identity.name: ShoreExplorer
identity.mission: To be the most trusted, accessible, and premium cruise port companion for travelers aged 30-70.
identity.design_philosophy: Digital Concierge - clearer than a map, friendlier than a schedule.

headings.usage: Use for H1, H2, H3. Expressive, high-contrast serif.
headings.strategy: Large, editorial sizes. H1 should be at least 2.5rem on mobile.

body.usage: All UI text, paragraphs, labels, buttons.
body.strategy: High x-height for legibility. Base size 16px minimum (1rem).

mono.usage: Time slots, flight numbers, coordinates, prices.

primary.description: Deep Ocean Indigo. Use for primary text, solid buttons, footer.

secondary.description: Warm Sand / Stone. MAIN BACKGROUND COLOR. Avoid pure white #FFFFFF for large areas.

accent.description: Sunset Coral. Use for CTAs, 'Book Now', High Priority alerts.

muted.description: Warm Grey. Use for secondary backgrounds, borders.

success.description: Teal. Use for 'On Time', 'Confirmed', Safe routes.

dark_mode_strategy.accent_adjustment: Keep Coral, but ensure 4.5:1 contrast against dark bg.

spacing.touch_target: min-h-[48px] min-w-[48px] for all interactive elements (CRITICAL for seniors).

grid_system.desktop: 12-column grid. Main content 8 cols, Sidebar 4 cols.

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: rounded-full bg-white border-2 border-primary/10 text-primary hover:bg-secondary transition-colors

cards.style: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-stone-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow
cards.postcard_variant: p-4 bg-white rotate-1 hover:rotate-0 transition-transform duration-300 shadow-lg border-8 border-white

inputs.style: h-14 rounded-xl bg-stone-50 border-stone-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary text-lg
inputs.labels: text-sm font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-muted-foreground mb-2 block

accessibility_rules.contrast: AA Large minimum (3:1) for headlines, AA (4.5:1) for body.
accessibility_rules.touch_targets: ALL buttons must be at least 48px height.
accessibility_rules.font_sizing: Allow dynamic type scaling. Don't fix heights in pixels.
accessibility_rules.screen_readers: All images need descriptive alt text. Icons need aria-hidden or aria-label.
accessibility_rules.motion: Respect prefers-reduced-motion. Disable parallax for these users.

instructions_to_main_agent: Initialize a Vite React project with Tailwind CSS.
Install 'shadcn-ui' but CUSTOMIZE the base styles to match the 'Warm Sand' theme defined above.
Do NOT use default 'Inter' font. Install '@fontsource/playfair-display' and '@fontsource/plus-jakarta-sans'.
Ensure 'mobile-first' responsiveness. Test all layouts at 375px width.
Use 'framer-motion' for subtle page transitions (fade-in, slide-up).
For the Map, use 'react-map-gl' or 'leaflet' (react-leaflet) with a custom muted tile style.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the PWA specific needs (bottom nav for mobile, top nav for desktop).
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
